mapper.insert: insert into db_antistopshop (SEQUENCEID, SITE, SORT, SELLSHOP, SELLMONEY, PUBLISHNUM, DEALNUM, SELLPRICE, PRODUCT, AVGPRICE, SUBRATE, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ANTISTOPID, RESULTFLAG, SHOPFLAG ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{publishnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{product,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{antistopid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{resultflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update db_antistopshop set SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLSHOP = #{sellshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLMONEY = #{sellmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHNUM = #{publishnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEALNUM = #{dealnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT = #{product,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVGPRICE = #{avgprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBRATE = #{subrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ANTISTOPID = #{antistopid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESULTFLAG = #{resultflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOPFLAG = #{shopflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SITE, SORT, SELLSHOP, SELLMONEY, PUBLISHNUM, DEALNUM, SELLPRICE, PRODUCT, AVGPRICE, SUBRATE, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ANTISTOPID, RESULTFLAG, SHOPFLAG from db_antistopshop where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, SITE, SORT, SELLSHOP, SELLMONEY, PUBLISHNUM, DEALNUM, SELLPRICE, PRODUCT, AVGPRICE, SUBRATE, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ANTISTOPID, RESULTFLAG, SHOPFLAG from db_antistopshop
